intro_text: As p_l walks along the territory, taking each paw step along, ears pricked, and eyes alert; searching for any sign of the rotting creature that threatens their very existence. As p_l fur begins to wisp in the wind, they turn to the horizon, their heart dropping like a stone. A dust storm was on the way!
decline_text: p_l looks for an escape, but it is futile, so they have to rush to hide.

success_text.unscathed_common: Given how little time had been given to p_l, they are able to run as fast as their four legs will take them, they're just able to jump through the window of an old rusted car and wait out the storm...

fail_text.injury: Due to the lack of warning, p_l picks up the pace, running as fast as their four legs will take them. However, it seems the dust storm was just too fast compared to them. As they narrow their eyes in an attempt to see through the constant swirling void of dust and debris, they spot a abandoned car just a few fox lengths away.. If they could just get there they'd be fine! Running towards the car, leaping and ducking under flying debris, they are able to reach the car and leap through the window and take cover in the car until the storm is over.
fail_text.death: p_l tried... They really did. They tried to run, they ran as fast as their four legs would allow them! But it just seemed that they couldn't find any where or anything to hide and wait the storm out... The Clan even sent a search patrol out looking for M_c, but it's like they disappear in then air...

history_text.injury: This cat was injured due to a dust storm
